hymn.title: Nothing between my soul and the Savior

Noth -- ing bet -- ween my soul and the Sav -- ior, So that His bless -- ed face may be seen; Noth -- ing pre -- vent -- ing the least of His fav -- or, Keep the way clear! Let noth -- ing bet -- ween.

lyrics.stanza: Nothing between my soul and the Savior, So that His blessed face may be seen; Nothing preventing the least of His favor, Keep the way clear! Let nothing between.
Nothing between, e'en many hard trials, Though the whole world against me convene; Watching with prayer and much self-denial, I'll triumph at last, with nothing between.
